languages.text: At the beginning of each of the daemon's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, all creatures around it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or suffer the horrors of the warp effect.
languages.original_text: В начале каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} демона все существа на соседних с ним клетках выполняют {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получают эффект "ужасы варпа".

traits.locale_text: At the beginning of each of the daemon's turns, all creatures around it must pass a Willpower resistance test or suffer the horrors of the warp effect.

At the beginning of each of the daemon's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, all creatures around it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or suffer the horrors of the warp effect.

languages.text: В начале каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} демона все существа на соседних с ним клетках выполняют {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получают эффект "ужасы варпа".

Zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Dämonen müssen alle Kreaturen um ihn herum eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen, ansonsten erleiden sie den {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} Schrecken des Warp.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of each of the daemon's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, all creatures around it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or suffer the horrors of the warp {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Dämonen müssen alle Kreaturen um ihn herum eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen, ansonsten erleiden sie den {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} Schrecken des Warp.

languages.text: Au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du démon, toutes les créatures qui l'entourent doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de résistance lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g}, faute de quoi elles subissent l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} Horreurs du Warp.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of each of the daemon's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, all creatures around it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or suffer the horrors of the warp {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du démon, toutes les créatures qui l'entourent doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de résistance lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g}, faute de quoi elles subissent l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} Horreurs du Warp.

languages.text: 当恶魔的每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，它周围的所有生物都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，未能通过检定的生物会遭受“亚空间的恐怖”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}影响。
languages.original_text: At the beginning of each of the daemon's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, all creatures around it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or suffer the horrors of the warp {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当恶魔的每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，它周围的所有生物都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，未能通过检定的生物会遭受“亚空间的恐怖”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}影响。

languages.text: Al principio de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del daemon, todas las criaturas que lo rodean deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} o sufrir el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} de horrores de la disformidad.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of each of the daemon's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, all creatures around it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or suffer the horrors of the warp {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Al principio de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del daemon, todas las criaturas que lo rodean deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} o sufrir el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} de horrores de la disformidad.

languages.text: ディーモンの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}が始まるたびに、周囲のすべての生物は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功しなければ、<歪み>のホラー{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}に苦しまなければならない。
languages.original_text: At the beginning of each of the daemon's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, all creatures around it must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or suffer the horrors of the warp {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ディーモンの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}が始まるたびに、周囲のすべての生物は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功しなければ、<歪み>のホラー{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}に苦しまなければならない。
